ExperienceSection.SubText: What I have done so far

Points.FirstPoint: Gaining first commercial experience in mobile game development.
Points.SecondPoint: Collaborating with different teams including designers and other developers.
Points.ThirdPoint: Solving problems of various complexities, ranging from project tasks to self-improvement.

ProjectsSection.ProjectsText: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
